title: Add admin panel with authentication for form submission management

requirements.text: Create an admin dashboard page that displays all contact form submissions from the backend in a table format, showing name, email, message, and timestamp for each submission

quotes: View all form submissions in a table

acceptanceCriteria: Admin page renders a table with columns for name, email, message, and any timestamp data
Table displays all submissions fetched from the backend getContactSubmissions function
Table is responsive and handles empty states gracefully

requirements.text: Implement search and filter functionality on the admin dashboard to allow filtering submissions by name, email, or message content
acceptanceCriteria: Search input filters table results in real-time
Filter works across name, email, and message fields

requirements.text: Add export functionality to download form submission data as CSV or JSON format from the admin dashboard
acceptanceCriteria: Export button triggers download of current filtered/searched submissions
Exported file includes all submission fields
File format is either CSV or JSON

requirements.text: Implement authentication using Internet Identity to restrict admin panel access so only authenticated users can view the admin dashboard

quotes: Add authentication so only i can access it

acceptanceCriteria: Admin dashboard requires Internet Identity authentication
Unauthenticated users are redirected or shown a login prompt
Authentication state persists across page refreshes
Backend validates authenticated requests if needed for sensitive operations

requirements.text: Create routing to separate the admin panel from the public-facing homepage, with a distinct URL path for the admin interface
acceptanceCriteria: Admin panel is accessible via a dedicated route (e.g., /admin)
Public homepage remains at root path

constraints: Use existing Internet Identity authentication system (useInternetIdentity hook)
Query form submissions using the existing getContactSubmissions backend function
Maintain the current public-facing website functionality
Admin panel styling should follow the existing saffron/terracotta/gold theme
nonGoals: Modifying the public contact form or homepage layout
Changing the backend ContactSubmission data structure
Creating user roles or multi-user access management
